00019 #ifndef LABEL_H
00020 #define LABEL_H
00021 
00022 #include "graph.h"
00023 
00024 #define UNLABELED -1
00025 
00026 #define forEachVertex(v) for(v = 0 ; v < size ; v++)
00027 #define forEachLabel(l) for(l = 0 ; l < size*2 ; l++)
00028 
00029 // This class contains the labels of the vertices of a graph
00030 // The vertices must be numbered from 0 to nbVertices-1
00031 // The labels are number between 0 and (2*nbVertices)-1 (used for two graphs)
00032 class Label {
00033         public :
00034         // constructor
00035         // tg the graph that contains the vertices to label
00036         Label(Graph * tg) {
00037                 g = tg;
00038                 size = g->getOrder();
00039                 lab = new short[size];
00040                 freq = new short[size*2];
00041         }
00042         
00043                 
00044         // destructor
00045         ~Label(void) {
00046                 delete [] lab;
00047                 delete [] freq;
00048         }
00049         
00050         // give all the vertices the label 0
00051         inline void allTheSameLabel(void) {
00052                 int i;
00053                 forEachVertex(i) lab[i] = 0;
00054                 forEachLabel(i) freq[i] = 0;
00055                 freq[0]=size;
00056                 nbDiffLabels = 1;
00057         }
00058         
00059 
00060         // restore a labelling given by the vector t
00061         // t[i] = label to give to the vertex i
00062         inline void restore(const short * t) {
00063                 int i;
00064                 forEachLabel(i) freq[i] = 0;
00065                 nbDiffLabels = 0;
00066                 forEachVertex(i) {
00067                         lab[i]=t[i];
00068                         if(freq[t[i]] == 0) nbDiffLabels++;
00069                         freq[t[i]]++;
00070                 }
00071                 return;
00072         }
00073         
00074         // store a labelling in t
00075         inline void store(short * t) const {
00076                 int i;
00077                 forEachVertex(i) {
00078                         t[i] = lab[i];
00079                 }
00080         }
00081         
00082         // return 0 if the two sets of labels are comparable
00083         // ATTENTION : suppose that the labels numbers are between 0 and size
00084         // only!!! so we must have to compare only the
00085         // lFirstGraph->compare(lSecondGraph)
00086         inline const int compare(const Label * toComp) const {
00087                 int i;
00088                 if(nbDiffLabels != toComp->nbDiffLabels) {
00089                         //cout << "Nb Labels différents" << endl;
00090                         return 1;
00091                 }
00092                 for(i = 0 ; i < nbDiffLabels ; i++) {
00093                         if(freq[i] != toComp->freq[i]) {
00094                                 return 1;
00095                         }
00096                 }
00097                 return 0;
00098         }
00099         
00100         // set the label of v to l
00101         inline void setLabel(const int v, const int l) {
00102                 if(freq[l] == 0) {
00103                         nbDiffLabels++;
00104                 }
00105                 freq[l]++;
00106                 lab[v]=l;
00107                 return;
00108         }
00109         
00110         // change the label of v to l
00111         inline void changeLabel(const int v, const int l) {
00112                 if(freq[lab[v]] == 1) {
00113                         nbDiffLabels--;
00114                 }
00115                 freq[lab[v]]--;
00116                 if(freq[l] == 0) {
00117                         nbDiffLabels++;
00118                 }
00119                 freq[l]++;
00120                 lab[v]=l;
00121                 return;
00122         }
00123         
00124         // return the label of v
00125         inline const short getLabel(const int v) const {
00126                 return lab[v];
00127         }
00128         
00129         // return the frequency of a label
00130         inline const short getFreq(const int l) const {
00131                 return freq[l];
00132         }
00133         
00134         inline const short getNbLabels(void) const {return nbDiffLabels;}
00135         
00136         
00137         
00138         private :
00139         
00140         short * lab; // the vertex labels
00141         short * freq; // the number of vertices having this label
00142         short nbDiffLabels; // the number of different labels used
00143         short size;     // size of the graph
00144         Graph * g; // graph
00145         
00146 };
00147 
00148 #endif
